channel.title: obsidian releases on Nicole van der Hoeven
channel.description: Recent content in obsidian releases on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: Obsidian properties in YAML frontmatter (v1.4)
item.description:
If you’ve ever tried to use Obsidian properties in YAML frontmatter, you may have noticed some issues. Obsidian v1.4 brings a new UI for properties that may just solve some of those, including the difficulty in keeping frontmatter properties and keys consistent.

Resources

  • Sign up for early access to all Obsidian releases
  • Full changelog
  • How to use the Dataview plugin (video)
  • How to use the Templater plugin (video)

item.title: Tabs in Obsidian (new in v1.0)
item.description: Introducing: Tabs in Obsidian v1.0! Obsidian’s latest release brings tab functionality to Obsidian, further adding to its flexibility in terms of letting us build workspaces the way we want. We can now have tabs in Obsidian and use them the way we would browser tabs. This release also came with some improvements for themes and the overall Obsidian UI.
